title: Blueberry cream cheese tart
ingredients: ['Shortcrust pastry', '315g plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '170g cold butter, cut into cubes', 'ice-cold water', 'Filling', '225g cream cheese', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons cream', '125ml water', '6 tablespoons cornflour', '300g sugar', '900g blueberries', '1 pinch of salt', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '30g butter']
